title: Rounding errors with different data types in DAX
excerpt: Different rounding differences can appear in DAX depending on data types and operations performed: knowing these details helps you write more robust DAX formulas and avoid comparison errors.   Article and download: https://sql.bi/796046?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt
